Name: Hawkeye
Star: Jeremy Renner, Hailee Steinfeld, Florence Pugh, Vera Farmiga
Summary: Series based on the Marvel Comics superhero Hawkeye, centering on the adventures of Young Avenger, Kate Bishop, who took on the role after the original Avenger, Clint Barton.

Name: The Unforgivable
Star: Sandra Bullock, Viola Davis, Vincent D'Onofrio, Jon Bernthal
Summary: A woman is released from prison after serving a sentence for a violent crime and re-enters a society that refuses to forgive her past.

Name: Dexter: New Blood
Star: Michael C. Hall, Jack Alcott, Julia Jones, Johnny Sequoyah
Summary: Set 10 years after Dexter Morgan went missing in the eye of Hurricane Laura, he is now living under an assumed name in Upstate New York, Iron Lake, far from his original home in Miami.

Name: The King's Man
Star: Ralph Fiennes, Gemma Arterton, Rhys Ifans, Harris Dickinson
Summary: In the early years of the 20th century, the Kingsman agency is formed to stand against a cabal plotting a war to wipe out millions.

Name: Pushpa: The Rise - Part 1
Star: Allu Arjun, Fahadh Faasil, Rashmika Mandanna, Dhananjaya
Summary: Story of Pushpa Raj, a lorry driver in Seshachalam forests of South India, set in the backdrop of red sandalwood smuggling. Red Sandalwood is endemic to South-Eastern Ghats (mountain range) of India.

Name: West Side Story
Star: Ansel Elgort, Rachel Zegler, Ariana DeBose, David Alvarez
Summary: An adaptation of the 1957 musical, West Side Story explores forbidden love and the rivalry between the Jets and the Sharks, two teenage street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds.

Name: Nightmare Alley
Star: Bradley Cooper, Cate Blanchett, Toni Collette, Willem Dafoe
Summary: An ambitious carny with a talent for manipulating people with a few well-chosen words hooks up with a female psychiatrist who is even more dangerous than he is.

Name: Daredevil
Star: Charlie Cox, Vincent D'Onofrio, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson
Summary: A blind lawyer by day, vigilante by night. Matt Murdock fights the crime of New York as Daredevil.

Name: Death on the Nile
Star: Kenneth Branagh, Gal Gadot, Tom Bateman, Rose Leslie
Summary: While on vacation on the Nile, Hercule Poirot must investigate the murder of a young heiress.

Name: Money Heist
Star: Úrsula Corberó, Álvaro Morte, Itziar Ituño, Pedro Alonso
Summary: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.

Name: House of Gucci
Star: Lady Gaga, Adam Driver, Al Pacino, Jeremy Irons
Summary: When Patrizia Reggiani, an outsider from humble beginnings, marries into the Gucci family, her unbridled ambition begins to unravel their legacy and triggers a reckless spiral of betrayal, decadence, revenge, and ultimately...murder.

Name: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
Star: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, Catherine O'Hara
Summary: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

Name: Dexter
Star: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, David Zayas, James Remar
Summary: He's smart. He's lovable. He's Dexter Morgan, America's favorite serial killer, who spends his days solving crimes and nights committing them. Golden Globe winner Michael C. Hall stars in the hit SHOWTIME Original Series.

Name: Titans
Star: Brenton Thwaites, Anna Diop, Ryan Potter, Teagan Croft
Summary: A team of young superheroes combat evil and other perils.

Name: The Batman
Star: Robert Pattinson, Peter Sarsgaard, Andy Serkis, Zoë Kravitz
Summary: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family while facing a serial killer known as the Riddler.

Name: Mayor of Kingstown
Star: Jeremy Renner, Dianne Wiest, Hugh Dillon, Tobi Bamtefa
Summary: The McLusky family are power brokers tackling themes of systemic racism, corruption and inequality in Kingstown, Michigan, where the business of incarceration is the only thriving industry.

Name: Peaky Blinders
Star: Cillian Murphy, Paul Anderson, Helen McCrory, Sophie Rundle
Summary: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.

Name: Landscapers
Star: Olivia Colman, David Thewlis, Kate O'Flynn, Dipo Ola
Summary: A devoted and mild-mannered British couple become the focus of an extraordinary investigation when two dead bodies are discovered in the back garden of a house in England.

Name: Breaking Bad
Star: Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul, Anna Gunn, Betsy Brandt
Summary: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

Name: The Sopranos
Star: James Gandolfini, Lorraine Bracco, Edie Falco, Michael Imperioli
Summary: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

Name: NCIS
Star: Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Sean Murray, Pauley Perrette
Summary: The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs.

Name: You
Star: Penn Badgley, Victoria Pedretti, Ambyr Childers, Elizabeth Lail
Summary: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

Name: The Blacklist
Star: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Summary: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.

Name: Gomorrah
Star: Salvatore Esposito, Marco D'Amore, Ivana Lotito, Cristiana Dell'Anna
Summary: Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.

Name: Wrath of Man
Star: Jason Statham, Holt McCallany, Josh Hartnett, Rocci Williams
Summary: The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week.

Name: The Boys
Star: Karl Urban, Jack Quaid, Antony Starr, Erin Moriarty
Summary: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Name: Criminal Minds
Star: Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna
Summary: The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again.

Name: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
Star: Mariska Hargitay, Christopher Meloni, Ice-T, Dann Florek
Summary: This series follows the Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of detectives in the N.Y.P.D., who investigate sexually related crimes.

Name: Cowboy Bebop
Star: John Cho, Mustafa Shakir, Daniella Pineda, Elena Satine
Summary: A ragtag crew of bounty hunters chases down the galaxy's most dangerous criminals. They'll save the world - for the right price.

Name: Better Call Saul
Star: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks, Patrick Fabian
Summary: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the time before he established his strip-mall law office in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

Name: West Side Story
Star: Natalie Wood, George Chakiris, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn
Summary: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

Name: The Dark Knight
Star: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
Summary: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Name: True Story
Star: Kevin Hart, Wesley Snipes, William Catlett, Paul Adelstein
Summary: A tour stop in Kid's hometown of Philadelphia becomes a matter of life and death for one of the world's most famous comedians.

Name: Castle
Star: Nathan Fillion, Stana Katic, Susan Sullivan, Jon Huertas
Summary: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.

Name: Aranyak
Star: Parambrata Chattopadhyay, Ashutosh Rana, Raveena Tandon, Taneesha Joshi
Summary: Political ploys, personal agendas and a beastly myth all surface as two mismatched hill station cops navigate a web of suspects after a puzzling murder.

Name: Ozark
Star: Jason Bateman, Laura Linney, Sofia Hublitz, Skylar Gaertner
Summary: A financial advisor drags his family from Chicago to the Missouri Ozarks, where he must launder money to appease a drug boss.

Name: Bad Santa
Star: Billy Bob Thornton, Bernie Mac, Lauren Graham, John Ritter
Summary: A miserable conman and his partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. But they run into problems when the conman befriends a troubled kid.

Name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
Star: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Summary: Comedy series following the exploits of Det. Jake Peralta and his diverse, lovable colleagues as they police the NYPD's 99th Precinct.

Name: Lucifer
Star: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, D.B. Woodside
Summary: Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.

Name: The Godfather
Star: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Diane Keaton
Summary: The Godfather follows Vito Corleone, Don of the Corleone family, as he passes the mantel to his unwilling son, Michael.

Name: Only Murders in the Building
Star: Steve Martin, Martin Short, Selena Gomez, Aaron Dominguez
Summary: Three strangers who share an obsession with true crime suddenly find themselves caught up in one.

Name: Riverdale
Star: Lili Reinhart, Camila Mendes, Cole Sprouse, K.J. Apa
Summary: While navigating the troubled waters of romance, school and family, Archie and his gang become entangled in dark Riverdale mysteries.

Name: The Wire
Star: Dominic West, Lance Reddick, Sonja Sohn, Wendell Pierce
Summary: The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

Name: Power Book II: Ghost
Star: Michael Rainey Jr., Method Man, Mary J. Blige, Shane Johnson
Summary: The journey of some of Power's most controversial characters.

Name: Midsomer Murders
Star: John Nettles, Jane Wymark, Barry Jackson, Neil Dudgeon
Summary: A veteran Detective Chief Inspector and his young Sergeant investigate murders around the regional community of Midsomer County.

Name: The Wolf of Wall Street
Star: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie, Matthew McConaughey
Summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

Name: Fargo
Star: Billy Bob Thornton, Martin Freeman, Allison Tolman, Colin Hanks
Summary: Various chronicles of deception, intrigue and murder in and around frozen Minnesota. Yet all of these tales mysteriously lead back one way or another to Fargo, North Dakota.

Name: Narcos: Mexico
Star: Scoot McNairy, José María Yazpik, Alejandro Edda, Alfonso Dosal
Summary: The rise of the Guadalajara Cartel as an American DEA agent learns the danger of targeting narcos in Mexico.

Name: The Rookie
Star: Nathan Fillion, Alyssa Diaz, Richard T. Jones, Melissa O'Neil
Summary: Starting over isn't easy, especially for John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of joining the LAPD. As their oldest rookie, he's met with skepticism from those who see him as just a walking midlife crisis.

Name: The Punisher
Star: Jon Bernthal, Amber Rose Revah, Ben Barnes, Jason R. Moore
Summary: After the murder of his family, Marine veteran Frank Castle becomes the vigilante known as "The Punisher," with only one goal in mind: to avenge them.
